overview: Mr. Mark Derek Haworth is the Director of Research at Sloane Robinson Investment Services Limited and is Co-investment Manager of SR Phoenicia Fund. Mr. Haworth also serves on the Advisory Board of SRPE LLP. He joined Sloane Robinson in November 1995. Mr. Haworth began his career at GT Management as a Continental European Analyst, with a focus on the telecommunications sector. He also managed UK and European portfolios for unit trust and offshore clients totalling some … $600m. Mr. Haworth graduated from Oxford University in 1991 with a first class Honors degree in Modern History.
